column5: Hey All,  Headed up north this weekend to hopefully get my self into a lake H steelie, and man did i get more then i bargained for.  Saturday:Started out saturday morning at 6:30am, trekked until I found a nice area. about 7-8 people in the area. very spread out.. about 2 hrs later  I hooked into my first steelhead of the year, a nice 3lbs.    then my 2nd not 45 minutes later...    I love the self pics!  decided to call it a morning. went home had some lunch, headed back to the same spot around 2pm. not a soul in the area. Landed my 3rd of the day around 4 pm.  this time i tried to camera timer..    Sunday: met up w/ m buddy nelson, i phoned him saturday night told him about my sucess and he was on his way the next morning. the day started out slow, missed a few hits.. froze my ass off, man is that water cold.. got all wamred up when i hooked into my 4th of the weekend , 1st of the day.    I bring the fish in and look back to where i caught my fish and theres nelson, nabbing my spot lol... So i moved down to where he was, not 20 minutes later, my 2nd of the day. a nice 8lb 3oz steelhead.. (if kris is reading this, funny how things even themselves out!)    and to cap off the awsome weekend.... minutes before we are ready to go, my 6the of the weekend...    what an awsome weekend went 6/6  dobee
nice report and congrats on the good weekend
Sounds Like it was worth freezin yer but off .Worth the drive to avoid the crowds
Nice Chromers! You hooked in some good numbers great report and pics keep em coming!
Great fishing report !!!!! and awesome pics as well..  .it sure looks like a nice spot,and beautiful scenery !!!!!    cheers
